mapper.select:
select * from std_disease disease where 1=1
and disease.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and disease.code like CONCAT('%',#{code},'%')
and disease.index_code like CONCAT('%',#{indexCode},'%')
order by disease.code
limit #{currentStartNum},#{pageSize}

select count(code) from std_disease disease where 1=1
and disease.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
and disease.code like CONCAT('%',#{code},'%')
and disease.index_code like CONCAT('%',#{indexCode},'%')
select count(code) from std_disease where code=#{code}

select code,name,en_name, alias_name,alias_name_index,index_code, fit_man_code_flag,fit_woman_code_flag,un_death_flag, un_primary_flag,clinical_diag,clinical_diag_index, attention_flag,attention_comment,std_region_code, std_province_code,international_disease_version, status,comment from std_disease where code=#{code}
mapper.insert:
insert into std_disease
code, name, en_name, index_code, alias_name, alias_name_index, fit_man_code_flag, fit_woman_code_flag, un_death_flag, un_primary_flag, clinical_diag, clinical_diag_index, attention_flag, attention_comment, std_region_code, std_province_code, international_disease_version, comment, status,
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aliasName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aliasNameIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fitManCodeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fitWomanCodeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{unDeathFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{unPrimaryFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{clinicalDiag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clinicalDiagIndex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attentionFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{attentionComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{interDiseaseVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
